tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: INSPIRATIONAL  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Dr. B is a great professor and is obviously passionate about sociology. The class is only based off of a few quizzes, but the quizzes are easy to pass if you show up to class. I\'ve missed a few days for health issues, but the quizzes are still pretty easy if you have a feel for the professor. He definitely leans left, but allows opinions in class.

stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  EXTRA CREDIT  CARING
comments: Dr. B, easiest professor. He puts his powerpoints online so print them off and study the words. pretty much all of his questions are pulled exact wording from the slides

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: CARING  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: I had Professor Bartlett for Social problems. He has a very liberal ideology and is sides heavily with leftist ideas (which he lectures about repeatedly). He never told us the grading scale. I did the extra credit and came out with 96% which is usually a 4.0, however it was a 3.8. Show up and read the slides and you will do just fine!

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: INSPIRATIONAL  EXTRA CREDIT  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: He\'s a really cool professor and doesn\'t grade harshly. The modules are always on canvas to study before tests and they are pretty easy. Attendance is not required, but if you miss less then 3 days you get 5 extra credit points. Also you don\'t need to buy the book so that was a relief!

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Attendence is not required but I feel is highly recommended! He will give you 5 extra credit points if you miss 3 or less days! He is very interesting and passionate about sociology. I really enjoyed his class and has me considering double majoring with nursing and sociology. I wasn\'t excited to take sociology but he completely changed my view.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: The grade was based on 4 quizzes that you could pass if you read through the module that was posted online. If you did any extra credit, it was an easy 4.0. He tended to talk about the same few points over and over and was not open to opinions that opposed his. He leans liberal and is very anti-gun and brought up points that didn\'t have relevance.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Down to earth guy, really wants you to understand the issues. He does tell quite a few personal stories, but if you can manage through that, it is an easy course. Very personable.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He is a great teacher, but I want to warn you do NOT buy the book for this class. He mentioned it maybe once but never used it and even said on the first day of class it was not required. Also, there are about 4 quizzes and if you just read over the powerpoint slides a couple times you should do fine on them. An A is 98%, so do the extra credit.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He\'s a wonderful professor who deeply cares about his students. However most of his class lectures discussed black culture and segregation. He rarely talked about other ethnic groups like Hispanic, Asian, Indian or etc who were also suppressed. It would be nice to hear about all ethnic groups and their different cultures in a sociology class.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I only had him for one class, but he is the best professor in my first year here. There\'s often a lot of notes, but he is nice enough to post his slides up a few days before the test in case you missed anything for that. Really engaging, and asks a lot of deeper questions looking into the heart of matters. A few readings online but no textbook.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: One of the best professors I\'ve had at eastern. He is there for you if you need it and is straight forward about tests and assignments. Great person and professor would take any class with him.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Passed this class with a 4.0 WITHOUT the textbooks required. Dr. B is honestly one of the best lecturers I\'ve ever had because he loves small talk. He puts his power point up one week before the end of the unit and all of his quizzes are fairly easy. Also, no final. Just the 4 quizzes and participation. Super easy.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He\'s amazing i would recommend him to anyone that wants a professor that cares about the student. He is very vocal in what he believes and understands but he loves to hear what you think. I love that he makes it a conversation and no one is wrong just sees it through a different lens. He\'s one of my all time favorite professors.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This class consists of 4 quizzes and is very easy to pass and it isn\'t necessary to go to class if you want to pass. And don\'t buy the book you will not use it.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Also known as Dr. B. Super awesome professor who shows he really cares about students and their success. He teaches Soc 263 and CSBS 200 -intro to leadership. I took both classes and got a 4.0....3 quizzes during the quarter & they are TF with 30-35 questions. questions come directly from powerpoint....I recommend his classes!!

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I took sociology and another class. He is a great professor truly cares about you and gives you true or false tests about 30 questions. He puts power point online. so you should really not have a problem passing this class with an A. especially for a gecr.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I was really looking forward to taking this class, hoping it would stretch me and cause me to think. Unfortunately, we rarely discussed issues or had the opportunity to share our thoughts. He\'ll tell you that he gives tests quizzes because he\'s supposed to, but doesn\'t want to, so they\'re really disorganized and confusing. Disappointing class.

tag_professor: Caring (10)  Respected (10)  Inspirational (9)  Amazing lectures (8)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Amazing and inspirational teacher. Truly cares about his students and is passionate about what he\'s teaching. Easy class, no final, four easy multiple choicetrue or false tests. Would absolutely recommend.
